definition.name: interpolating_path
definition.definition: rho(t) := (1-t) rho_AB + t sigma_AB, t ∈ [0,1]. delta_AB := sigma_AB - rho_AB (traceless Hermitian). delta_B := sigma_B - rho_B = Tr_A[delta_AB]. rho(t)_B := Tr_A[rho(t)] = (1-t)rho_B + t sigma_B. tau(t) := 1_A ⊗ rho(t)_B (conditional reference, Tr[tau(t)] = d_A). omega(t) := tau(t)/d_A (normalised reference, Tr[omega(t)] = 1).
